div.p: A patient visit is further characterized by the setting in which it takes place, amongst them are ambulatory, emergency, home health, inpatient and virtual visits. An Visit encompasses the whole lifecycle of an visit from making appointments, to planning, the actual visit (for ambulatory visits), and admission, stay and discharge (for inpatient visits). An Visit has a single reason, during the visit the patient may move from practitioner to practitioner and location to location.
